channel.title: Holding down Crowbar rotates player?
channel.description:
Anyone else notice this?
If you're standing in front of a wall and start hitting it with the crowbar, such that you go into "fast smashing" mode, the view rotates a little bit to the right with each whack. If you keep this up for about 5 seconds, you'll be noticeably offset from where you started - as evidenced by the fact that the impact effect for each whack doesn't move with you. When you let go of the left mouse button, the view slowly rotates back to where it should be (and it's rather vomit-inducing if you start moving while this happens! <X ).

item.title: Holding down Crowbar rotates player?
item.dc:creator: R34L0RD
item.description:
Peter Brev:
R34L0RD:
Peter Brev:

The magical search button is useful though.

Prepare for unforeseen consequences.

That search is a little bit “croppy”, if I search for “crowbar”, all I have is: No items matched your search terms: “crowbar”.The right man in the wrong place can make all the diferrence in the world.

Pardon me for the post.

That’s fine. No problem.

Read full topic
